org.openntf.todo.domino

Class ToDoStoreFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openntf.todo.domino.ToDoStoreFactory

  • public class ToDoStoreFactory
extends Object
    Author:
    Paul Withers The class handles all Domino-related code for ToDos

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ToDoStoreFactory getInstance()
        Returns:
        ToDoStoreFactory instance

      • getStores

        public Map<String,Store> getStores()
        Load all stores from ToDo Catalog into memory. This uses a ConcurrentHashMap because we're never expecting there to be too many. If we needed more, we'd use a Cache - either using a memcache or Ehcache server, or within the HttpServer using a Google Guava LoadingCache.
        Returns:
        ConcurrentHashMap of Store objects, with replicaID as key

      • getStoresForCurrentUser

        public List<Store> getStoresForCurrentUser()
        Get all stores the current User has access to
        Returns:
        List of Stores

      • addStore

        public Store addStore(org.openntf.domino.Database db)
        Add an NSF as a Store object to stores ConcurrentHashMap and writes to ToDo Catalog
        Parameters:
        db - NSF to add
        Returns:
        Store corresponding to the relevant NSF

      • initialiseStoreFromDatabase

        public Store initialiseStoreFromDatabase(org.openntf.domino.Database db)
        Converts NSF to a Store object, serializing to ToDo catalog
        Parameters:
        db - NSF to create a Store object from
        Returns:
        Store corresponding to the relevant NSF

      • serializeStoreToCatalog

        public void serializeStoreToCatalog(Store store)
        Writes a Store to the catalog database. Note: we write the json to a single field called json, because it's not needed in a view
        Parameters:
        store - Store to write to the catalog database

      • deserializeStoreFromDoc

        public Store deserializeStoreFromDoc(org.openntf.domino.Document doc)
        Takes the Notes Document and extracts the json field, using Gson to convert it to a Store
        Parameters:
        doc - the document in the catalog database
        Returns:
        Store object

      • getStoreUnchecked

        public Store getStoreUnchecked(org.openntf.domino.Session sess,
                               String key)
        Get a Store object for the current session based on a Key
        Parameters:
        sess - relevant Domino Session
        key - ReplicaID or filepath
        Returns:
        Store object for the NSF or null

      • getStore

        public Store getStore(String key)
               throws StoreNotFoundException
        Gets a store based on replica ID or filepath, running as the current user
        Parameters:
        key - Store NSF's replicaId or filepath
        Returns:
        Store
        Throws:
        StoreNotFoundException - if it can't be found

      • getStoreAsNative

        public Store getStoreAsNative(String key)
                       throws StoreNotFoundException
        Gets a Store based on replica ID or filepath, running as the server
        Parameters:
        key - Store NSF's replicaId or filepath
        Returns:
        Store
        Throws:
        StoreNotFoundException - if it can't be found

      • checkStoreExists

        public boolean checkStoreExists(String key)
        Validation method, to check whether a Store NSF already exists, running as the server
        Parameters:
        key - Store NSF's replicaId or filepath
        Returns:
        boolean whether NSF exists or not

      • getToDoCollectionRange

        public List<ToDo> getToDoCollectionRange(Store store,
                                         ToDosResource.ViewType viewType,
                                         Date startDate,
                                         Date endDate)
                                  throws DatabaseModuleException
        Gets a collection of ToDos from the By Date view
        Parameters:
        store - Store from which to get the collection
        viewType - ViewType, always By Date
        startDate - for dueDate field of ToDos
        endDate - for dueDate field of ToDos
        Returns:
        List of ToDos
        Throws:
        DatabaseModuleException - error if Store or View could not be found

      • getToDoCollection

        public List<ToDo> getToDoCollection(Store store,
                                    ToDosResource.ViewType viewType,
                                    Object key)
                             throws DatabaseModuleException
        Gets a collection of ToDos based on a key. . If we wanted to improve performance then, depending on memory, we could use some kind of cache. We would need to manage the size, so a Google Guava LoadingCache would make sense using the metaversalId as the key (loading from the Document) or a memcache / Ehcache server.
        Parameters:
        store - Store from which to get the collection
        viewType - ViewType to identify which view in the NSF
        key - Object with which to get collection
        Returns:
        List of ToDos
        Throws:
        DatabaseModuleException - error if Store or View could not be found

      • getView

        public org.openntf.domino.View getView(org.openntf.domino.Database db,
                                       ToDosResource.ViewType viewType)
                                throws DatabaseModuleException
        Gets the relevant view based on the ViewType passed from the NSF passed
        Parameters:
        db - Database ToDo instance
        viewType - ViewType to identify which view to get
        Returns:
        View from the ToDo instance NSF
        Throws:
        DatabaseModuleException - error if we can't get a view for the relevant ViewType (defensive coding)

      • serializeToStore

        public ToDo serializeToStore(Store store,
                             ToDo todo)
                      throws DataNotAcceptableException,
                             StoreNotFoundException
        Creates a new ToDo to the relevant Store, returning the ToDo object
        Parameters:
        store - Store object from which to get the NSF
        todo - ToDo to write to the Store
        Returns:
        ToDo serialized and updated as required (e.g. with metaversalId)
        Throws:
        DataNotAcceptableException - error if Store not passed
        StoreNotFoundException - error if Store couldn't be found as current user

      • updateToDo

        public ToDo updateToDo(ToDo todo)
                throws StoreNotFoundException,
                       DocumentNotFoundException,
                       InvalidMetaversalIdException
        Updates an existing ToDo
        Parameters:
        todo - ToDo to update (PATCH)
        Returns:
        stored ToDo
        Throws:
        StoreNotFoundException - error if Store NSF could not be found
        DocumentNotFoundException - error if document could not be found (e.g. already deleted)
        InvalidMetaversalIdException - error if the metaversalId passed is not valid

      • getToDoFromMetaversalId

        public ToDo getToDoFromMetaversalId(String metaversalId)
                             throws StoreNotFoundException,
                                    DocumentNotFoundException,
                                    InvalidMetaversalIdException
        Gets a ToDo based on the metaversalId passed
        Parameters:
        metaversalId - String replicaId + UNID
        Returns:
        ToDo deserialized from the document
        Throws:
        StoreNotFoundException - error if Store NSF could not be found
        DocumentNotFoundException - error if document could not be found (e.g. already deleted)
        InvalidMetaversalIdException - error if the metaversalId passed is not valid

      • getToDoDoc

        public org.openntf.domino.Document getToDoDoc(String metaversalId)
                                       throws StoreNotFoundException,
                                              DocumentNotFoundException,
                                              InvalidMetaversalIdException
        Gets a ToDo Notes Document based on a metaversalId
        Parameters:
        metaversalId - passed String replicaId + UNID
        Returns:
        Document for the relevant metaversalId
        Throws:
        StoreNotFoundException - error if Store NSF could not be found
        DocumentNotFoundException - error if document could not be found (e.g. already deleted)
        InvalidMetaversalIdException - error if the metaversalId passed is not valid

      • deserializeToDoFromDoc

        public ToDo deserializeToDoFromDoc(org.openntf.domino.Document doc)
        Takes the Notes Document and converts to a ToDo. We store data in separate fields because we display the content in a view (although we could store the full json in a single field and just store view fields separately - then use Gson to deserialize)
        Parameters:
        doc - Notes Document
        Returns:
        ToDo deserialized from the document

      • deleteToDoDoc

        public boolean deleteToDoDoc(String metaversalId)
                      throws StoreNotFoundException,
                             DocumentNotFoundException,
                             InvalidMetaversalIdException
        Deletes a ToDo Notes Document
        Parameters:
        metaversalId - passed String replicaId + UNID
        Returns:
        boolean success or failure
        Throws:
        StoreNotFoundException - error if Store NSF could not be found
        DocumentNotFoundException - error if document could not be found (e.g. already deleted)
        InvalidMetaversalIdException - error if the metaversalId passed is not valid

      • loadStores

        public void loadStores()
        Load all stores from ToDo Catalog or creates ToDo Catalog database, done via HttpService 30 seconds after server starts or first HTTP call, if sooner

      • markOverdue

        public void markOverdue(String nextUrl)
                 throws DatabaseModuleException
        Marks ToDos due before now as Overdue in all ToDo NSFs
        Parameters:
        nextUrl - URL to send list of updated ToDos to
        Throws:
        DatabaseModuleException - error if Store could not be found

      • updateToDoNSFTitle

        public void updateToDoNSFTitle(Store store)
        Changes the title of a Store NSF
        Parameters:
        store - Store to update

      • createToDoNSF

        public Store createToDoNSF(String title,
                           String name,
                           Store.StoreType type)
                    throws DatabaseModuleException
        Creates a ToDo NSF instance
        Parameters:
        title - for the new ToDo NSF
        name - filepath for the new ToDo NSF
        type - StoreType, Personal or Team
        Returns:
        Store corresponding to ToDo NSF
        Throws:
        DatabaseModuleException - error if the ToDo NSF could not be created

      • updateAccess

        public void updateAccess(Store store,
                         User user)
                  throws DatabaseModuleException
        Update ACL for a Store based on the User passed. Runs as server
        Parameters:
        store - Store to update
        user - User object containing username and updated DatabaseAccess
        Throws:
        DatabaseModuleException - error if ToDo instance NSF can't be retrieved

      • addAccess

        public void addAccess(org.openntf.domino.ACL acl,
                      String username,
                      DatabaseAccess access)
               throws DatabaseModuleException
        Updates the ACL for a given username and DatabaseAccess
        Parameters:
        acl - ACL object for the ToDo instance NSF
        username - for the new ACL entry
        access - DatabaseAccess object to use to set access levels
        Throws:
        DatabaseModuleException - if ACL could not be set

      • queryAccess

        public DatabaseAccess queryAccess(Store store,
                                  String username)
        Check access for specific username for a ToDo instance NSF
        Parameters:
        store - to which to query access
        username - for whom to query
        Returns:
        DatabaseAccess object for the relevant user

      • userIsAdmin

        public boolean userIsAdmin(Store store,
                           String username)
        Checks whether the user has [Admin] role for the ToDo instance NSF
        Parameters:
        store - for the ToDo instance
        username - to check for
        Returns:
        boolean whether or not the user has the [Admin] role
